title: Reorder header navigation: move 'About Us' after 'Industries We Serve'

requirements.text: Update the top-level header navigation order so the menu item labeled "About Us" appears immediately after the menu item labeled "Industries We Serve" (and before "Contact Us") in both the desktop header navigation and the mobile menu.

quotes: the header menu item  'about us ' should appear after 'industries we serve '

acceptanceCriteria: In the desktop header, the top-level menu order is: Home, Our Solutions, Industries We Serve, About Us, Contact Us.
In the mobile menu, the top-level menu order matches the desktop header order.
Only the ordering changes; labels, paths, dropdown children, and hover/dropdown behavior remain unchanged.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components are read-only).
Respect existing navigation IDs/paths; only reorder items.
nonGoals: No changes to page content or routing.
No changes to footer navigation layout/content unless required as a direct consequence of reordering the shared navigation config.
